reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's color and find it comfortable and soft. The fabric quality receives mixed feedback, with several customers reporting huge holes underneath both arms. Moreover, the dress is very see-through, and customers disagree on the sizing, with one noting it runs big. The quality is also mixed, with some finding it good while others report poor quality. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy!!
items.body: Highly recommend! Very good quality and super cute. I got a size small and I’m 5’5 and 140lbs. Read more
items.author: abby webb

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: Very cute!! It’s exactly as pictured! It’s so soft. Not itchy. It is a bit thin and fragile, so beware when wearing not to snag on things or pull too roughly. I wore it recently with tall boots (cold out) but def could be a summer item as well I took off one start because mine has a small hole in the seam up top. I still wore it because I could hide it, but I saw other people had this problem also Read more
items.author: Lauren Myrick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect vacation or dinner dress!
items.body: This dress is beautiful! Great material & stretchy! The black dress is just the right amount of see through. Love it! Read more
items.author: Cynthia sanchez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need to buyyyyy
items.body: Very beautiful dress I got so many compliments on it. It is a little short but nothing too crazy Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not purchase
items.body: Do not order this dress. It is not what the picture shows, it is almost floor length and the fit is terrible Read more
items.author: Tabitha Mason

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing
items.body: I love the dress but it’s definitely see through! The material is not as stretchy so definitely go a size up ! Read more
items.author: natalie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and stylish but a bit hot
items.body: This off-the-shoulder beach cover-up dress is really cute and definitely stylish. I love the look of it, especially the flare sleeves, and it has a flattering fit that feels perfect for a beach day. The only downside is that it’s a lot hotter than I expected. Even though it looks a bit see-through, the texture is more like a towel, so it doesn’t feel very breathable. I’m a little torn because I love the style and how it looks, but I wish it were lighter and cooler to wear. Read more
items.author: Demian Solis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Red, Pink, White, Beige, Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
